article: a meeting of nepali major four political parties -- the communist party of nepal -lrb- maoist -rrb- -lrb- cpn-m -rrb- , nepali congress -lrb- nc -rrb- , the communist party nepal-unified marxist leninist -lrb- cpn-uml -rrb- and madhesi janadhikar forum -lrb- unk -rrb- -- monday decided to prepare a joint common minimum program -lrb- cmp -rrb- to form a new consensus government .
abstract: four nepali parties to draft new common program for consensus gov t
